# EventFiringWebServiceDriver.GetContent Method (String, String, Boolean)
 

Do a web service get for the given uri and media type

## Syntax

**C#**<br />
``` C#
protected override Task<HttpResponseMessage> GetContent(
	string requestUri,
	string mediaType,
	bool expectSuccess = true
)
```
